resources.string:
The &app_name; PDM cannot be used with a SIM card. To use your PDM:

1. Remove the battery
2. Remove the SIM card
3. Reinstall the battery and restart the PDM.
The &app_name; app has not communicated with your Pod in the last %1$s hours. Tap OK to communicate with your Pod.

Are you sure you want to delete the %1$s Basal Program?

(This cannot be undone.)
Your sensor glucose value is unavailable. Check back at %s
When the Pod was discarded, it was unable to confirm how much of the last bolus was delivered. The last bolus unit value is the amount that was scheduled to be delivered.

Use a meter to check your BG:
  •  If low BG confirmed, consider treatment
  •  If high BG confirmed, check infusion site and ketones
&app_name; must switch to Manual Mode.

Your device time zone:
%1$s

Your insulin delivery time zone:
%2$s

Update insulin delivery to your device time zone?
{@string/nonexistent_name} is an example of nonexistent reference.
Fill out a form at &setup_link; to get a call back
